name: Van den Keere's 'Miniature Speed' Lancashire (1627)
description: Pieter van den Keere's miniature county map of Lancashire, based on Speed's maps. Published by George Humble as a pocket atlas.
notes:
Pieter van den Keere (Petrus Kaerius), 1571-c.1646.
Originally engraved c.1599, first published 1617 in Latin Camden's Britannia by Blaeu.
George Humble published them 1627 as pocket versions of Speed's atlas.
Known as 'Miniature Speed' maps.
